user_stories.Title: User story: Pass Skill Quizzes
user_stories.User story: As a user, I want to pass skill quizzes, so that I can get skill badges.
Acceptance criteria: Given a quiz with questions and answers
Then the quiz should be marked as passed

user_stories.Title: User story: Practice Skill Quizzes
user_stories.User story: As a user, I want to practice skill quizzes, so that I can improve my results.
Acceptance criteria: Given a quiz with questions and answers
When answering questions with different results
Then the quiz should provide feedback on correct and incorrect answers

user_stories.Title: User story: Randomized Questions
user_stories.User story: As a user, I want to be asked 5 questions from the list at random, so that I can practice different questions each time.
Acceptance criteria: Then 5 questions should be randomly selected from the list

user_stories.Title: User story: One Question at a Time
user_stories.User story: As a user, I want to be asked each question separately, so that I can focus on each question separately.
Acceptance criteria: Then only one question should be presented at a time

user_stories.Title: User story: Quiz Results
user_stories.User story: As a user, I want to review my results at the end of the quiz, so that I know how I did.
Acceptance criteria: Then display the correct answers, user's selected answers, and overall quiz result
